title: Payment Gateway Failure on Checkout
description: User reported that the payment button does nothing after clicking on it. Affecting crucial purchases.

title: Request for Data Export Feature in CSV
description: Customer needs the ability to export their monthly report data in a comma-separated value file format.

title: Account Lockout due to Failed Logins
description: The user forgot their password and is unable to use the reset link. Requires manual unlock.

title: Invoice Amount Mismatch (October)
description: The billed amount for October is $450, but the agreed-upon amount was $400. Billing correction needed.

title: Query about API Rate Limits for Enterprise Plan
description: Customer is asking about the exact rate limit details for their new enterprise subscription.

title: UI Bug: Profile Editing Page Crashes
description: When updating the date of birth field, the application throws an unhandled error and crashes.

title: System slow down after recent update
description: Performance has degraded significantly since the last system update, affecting all users in the organization.

title: Missing Documentation for Webhook Integration
description: The provided documentation link for setting up Webhooks is broken (404 Not Found).

title: Subscription Cancellation Request
description: Customer wishes to cancel the subscription immediately due to budget constraints.

title: Need help setting up custom domain
description: Customer is confused about the DNS records required for custom domain mapping.
